name: Payload-Chunk and Bytes conversion
Configuration-Data Points
func:
msg.data = msg.payload;
msg.payload = [
    {name: "Power 1", descriptions: "Power 1 at main", unit:"KW", multiplier:10, position:0},
    {name: "Power 2", descriptions: "Power 2 at main", unit:"KW", multiplier:10, position:1},
    {name: "Power 3", descriptions: "Power 3 at main", unit:"KW", multiplier:10, position:2},
    {name: "Voltage 1", descriptions: "Voltage 1", unit:"V", multiplier:10, position:3},
    {name: "Voltage 2", descriptions: "Voltage 2", unit:"V", multiplier:10, position:4},
    {name: "Voltage 3", descriptions: "Voltage 3", unit:"V", multiplier:10, position:5},
    {name: "Current 1", descriptions: "Current 1", unit:"A", multiplier:10, position:6},
    {name: "Current 2", descriptions: "Current 2", unit:"A", multiplier:10, position:7},
    {name: "Current 3", descriptions: "Current 3", unit:"A", multiplier:10, position:8},];

return msg;
